author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Convert all existing Run3 and Phase2 scenarios to dd4hep format and try to check them against failures

#### PR validation:

Use built in cfg files in Geometry/CMSCommonData/test/dd4hep

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

#### Links to additional material/slides/JIRA tickets/Pull requests:

Nothing special - no back porting is needed
title: Run3-sim52 Try out all run3 + phase2 scenario in dd4hep
